clue: Time-wasting meetings at fault, it's alleged
explanation: MEETINGS waste time, losing T. MEEINGS. "At fault" tells us to anagram MEEINGS. Doing that can give us SEEMING. What is "seeming"? It's "alleged"!
hints: "At fault" is a way of telling us to rearrange some letters.
Time is commonly abbreviated to T.
What does it mean if MEETINGS is "time-wasting"?
The definition for this one is "alleged".
